summary: Slikey, re: Molina asking if Hytale could have a pre-load
mainText: 'No pre-load. That would require more system to be built to decrypt downloads etc. We don't have capacity for it.'

summary: Slikey, re: potential for OAuth 2.0 system that external developers can use
mainText: 'Not for launch, we need to evaluate the use-cases and potential impact to privacy, child protection & security. We understand the value it would provide to third-party websites that want to offer out-of-game experiences.'

summary: Slikey, re: server plugin dev asking for information
mainText: 'It starts January 13 - if we were to now partially release the game, it wouldn't help anyone truly, create more noise for us and in the end result in more frustrations. There is no reason for FOMO on such a new ecosystem where everyone has to learn from scratch.'

summary: Oscar, re: user describing what those two tracks sound like
mainText: 'You're right to point that out. I find the retro sounds from the 80s, 90s, 00s really endearing and love using it in my music! I just can't regularly do so in the mostly orchestral OST of Hytale, but that doesn't stop me from trying whenever I can üòú including jazzy stuff.'
